Title: Surcos
Writer: Eugenio Montes (idea), José Antonio Nieves Conde (technical screenplay), Gonzalo Torrente Ballester (adaptation), Natividad Zaro (adaptation)
Actors: Luis Peña, María Asquerino, Francisco Arenzana, Marisa de Leza
Plot: The struggles of a Spanish family as it emigrates from the country to Madrid circa 1950.
